help: ```!help command```
```!get name```
-Returns the link with the matching name
**Options**
`!getlink` or `!getl` perform default function

message.notfound: No link with that name in the database

help: ```!add link, name, tag1, tag2, ...```
-Links must start with "http"
-Link names and tags may contain spaces, and are NOT case sensitive
Example:
```!add https://link, link name, first tag, second tag```
**Options**
`!addlink` or `!addl` do the same as `!add`
`!addtags` or `!addtag` or `!addt` may be used to add tags to specified links:
```!addt name of link, tag1, tag2, tag3```
`!addlink` or `!addl` will perform default operation.

help: ```!find keyword 1, keyword 2, ..., last keyword```
-Find will return any links whose names or tags contain any of the keywords
-Keywords may have spaces, but this will limit your search
**Options**
`!findlinks` or `!findlink` or `!findl` may be used optionally to specify a search for links
`!findtags` or `!findtag` or `!findt` may be used to optionally specify a search for tags
Unsupported options will be ignored. Command will still execute links search by default.
*Note: If no keywords are entered in !findtags, Find will return all tags from all links*

message.notfound: No results. Make sure to separate each keyword with a comma to expand search.

help: ```!delete linkname```
-Link names may contain spaces and are NOT case sensitive
-This command cannot be undone, and takes effect immediately
**Options**
`!deletelink` or `!deletel` may be used optionally to specify deletion of a link
`!deletetags` or `!deletetag` or `!deletet` may be used to optionally specify deletion of a list of tags within a link
*NOTE: The rule that all links must have at least one tag is enforced.*

help: ```!quote username, quote name```
`!quote` will save the last message from the specified user.
-Usernames are case sensitive, and must be an exact match.
-Quote names may contain spaces and are NOT case sensitive
**Options**
`!quoteme` will save your own last message.
